definitions.text: the shape or manner in which things come together and a connection is made
a set containing all and only the members of two or more given sets
examples: let C be the union of the sets A and B

definitions.text: become part of; become a member of a group or organization
examples: He joined the Communist Party as a young man

definitions.text: cause to become joined or linked
examples: join these two parts so that they fit together
She joined him for a drink

definitions.text: be or become joined or united or linked
examples: The two streets connect to become a highway
The travelers linked up again at the airport
